sum_bart: The letter was sent to the Vice President, Listing Department of the Bombay Stock Exchange. The letter was addressed to the Company Secretary of Wonderla Holidays Limited.
sum_peg: Wonderla Holidays Limited has informed the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Thursday, 10th April, 2017, inter alia, to consider and approve the audited financial results of the Company for the financial year ended 3 1st March, 2025.
sum_t5: Certificate under Regulation 40(9) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 from practising Company Secretary for the financial year ended 3 1st March, 2025. Thanking You, Yours faithfully, For Wonderla Holidays Limited Srinivasulu Raju Y Company Secretary
